alert.note: Alert for Beckham (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 15 at 3:05PM CDT until June 15 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN WASHITA...NORTHWESTERN KIOWA...NORTHEASTERN GREER AND EASTERN BECKHAM COUNTIES... At 305 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Granite, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mangum, Granite, Lone Wolf, Willow, Retrop, Brinkman, and Altus-Lugert Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A tornado watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
